ISSUE.TITLE: [Monorepo Detection] Add monorepo-managers.ts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This file will mimic the structure of `vercel/frameworks/frameworks.ts` in the sense that it defines the list of supported monorepo managers. These are the ones were targeting for the initial launch, - Turborepo ```ts export const monorepoManagers = [ { name: "Turborepo", slug: "turbo", detectors: { every: [ { path: 'turbo.json' }, ], }, }, ] ```
